Room.Name: Nylandian Beach Promatory
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a sandy beach which juts into the Nylandian Bay.
Room.LongDescription: There are high rocks between you and the water at this part of the beach. Seals and sealions bask on the rocks, and occasionly slide off with a plop to play in the bay. The sand glistens under your feet. This area extends into the bay where you can see another island farther south.
